item.title: Sub Points multiplyer help in fight.java
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

if(attacker instanceof Player) { Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker; { if(attackerPlayer.isSubscriber()) { attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 4)); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints(); } } attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3)); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints(); } attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON); opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST); } }
well, i dont know if this works… but you can look.

item.title: Sub Points multiplyer help in fight.java
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Thanks but it now says that set points int in player.java cannot be applied to

owner.setPoints(owner.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3.5)); cannot be applied to double.

Thanks for looking

item.title: Sub Points multiplyer help in fight.java
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

oo okay, i seee.

do this:

if(owner.isSubscriber()) { owner.setPoints(owner.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3.5)); owner.getActionSender().sendPoints(); }
im sure it will work

Read full topic

item.title: Sub Points multiplyer help in fight.java
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

if(owner.isSub()) { owner.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3.5); owner.getActionSender().sendPoints(); }

test this… i think it will work. now it marked as SUBSCRIBER RANK going to get 3.5 exp rate, and the normal 2 exp rate.
youve maked a subscriber rank in player.java and idont know what you named it 2. but use it on (owner.is?()).
hope you understand…

item.source: Sub Points multiplyer help in fight.java

item.title: Sub Points multiplyer help in fight.java
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Hey everyone sorry for all the posts im just trying to iron out the little bugs.
Thanks for all the help so far!

What im trying to do is when someone becomes a sub they get extra points when they kill a mob ( I know how to make it give them extra experience but points is a different thing and needs to be done using fight.java as far as im aware).

I cant seem to get the code right in order for this to happen.

So you understand what i am trying to do i will explain it a little better.

This is the code from fight.java for giving points to a player :

if(attacker instanceof Player) { int points = owner.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 2); owner.getActionSender().sendPoints();

What i need it to do is check the players rank and then give points accordingly so something like:

If owner.getGroupID() >= (1); owner.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3.5); }else if If owner.getGroupID() <(1); owner.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 2);

Thanks for looking

Read full topic
